Raid Overhaul.warning: Certain settings are not compatible with Fika. Still in testing.

Declutter.warning: Works in some cases, others not. Test it for yourself.

Profile Editor.warning: Can corrupt presets. Use at your own peril.

Friendly PMCs.warning: Not friendly when >1 player; may cause weird errors.

That's Lit.warning: Needs the sync add-on (Check Pins on Discord) or significant FPS drop.

LootRadius.warning: Not working with latest Fika; view-only issues.

LootValue.warning: Will lag game the longer raid goes on.

Various Hardcore Starts.warning: Prevents dedicated client from generating the .bat file.

Boss Notifier.warning: Only accurate for raid host, not clients.

EFTApi.warning: May cause issues if not synced.
